resources.string: myDiem is an app that allows you to analyse your apps usages metrics and share that on the Streamr data Marketplace anonymously.
Your anonymous data will be aggregated with many other users, creating a revenue sharing Community Product.

You will automatically receive a portion of any revenue generated by the sale of that aggregate data and you will be able to withdraw your earnings to your digital wallet that will be created in the next few steps.
Below are examples that MyDiem will collect

Get a list of all applications that are stored on this device. 
 
 Read about how much time you spend on each application. 
 
 The application activity names and its model data usage 
 
 Mobile device information like language and network type.
myDiem will only collect app usage metrics like time spent on an app, when it was opened or closed, but it will never collect any action or information within any app.
In Order to allow this app to collect apps usage metrics,you need to grant it some permissons first.We take your privacey very seriously.
Grant app the permission to read apps metrics
To track app usage metrics,please allow us to access media on your device.
You can decide to share anonymously your location data.This will allow you to receive additional revenue from this data,in addition to your app usege metrics.
You will alse have option to enabel location sharing later from within myDiem app settings.
